com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.option

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.option.Options

  • public final class Options
extends java.lang.Object
    Option holder. This class holds all options and store values defined for the option.

    • Constructor Summary

      Options()

      Gets the value of option.

      Gets a immutable map of options and their defined values.

      Gets the option value if present, or returns value if not.

      Sets a Option value.
